ygData.messageBody:
--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> 1. You also need to throw weight into that
> equation. Because even tho a mino axe has a better
> ratio than a FS sword, but after about 3 mobs your
> stamina is shot, which lowers your stats, including
> your attack ability. Try the same thing with 2 FS
> long swords and you'll still have plenty of stamina.

That's a good point, one I've not considered. I haven't yet had any
problems with either of my characters yet in the Stamina department
(Dwarven Paladin and Troll Warrior); I only have Stamina problems when
I'm fleeing across zones, jumping to stay ahead of them. But it's an
excellent point; the Mino axe is *heavy*.

Weight also impacts your possible lootage potential; lighter 'carry'
gear/weapons = more loot to take back! This has got to be a good
thing, neh?

> 2. That would depend on what you are fighting, and
> you must also calculate in the reposte skill. When
> you can reposte for 10 points with a 1h slash or 44
> points with a 2h slash, bit of a difference there.

I know nothing about Riposte; neither of my characters have it, and no
one on any of the boards/lists/sites I read has said anything about it.
Anyone have info re: Riposte? I'd love to hear it.
